title: Deirdre Hargey – 2022 Comments on DUP Boycott of Stormont
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Deirdre Hargey, the Sinn Fein Minister for the Communities, on 17 August 2022.
content:
News today that gas prices will rise again by up to 30% in October is another kick in the teeth for people whose bills are already through the roof.
